fulltext:
TRỊNH MINH TOÀN 
OBJECTIVE 
As a senior student with a passion for learning and self-improvement, I hope to be able to find an 
Fresher to improve my knowledge and create opportunities in the field of Software Development. I 
want to use my best skills to make a positive contribution to your company and wish to establish a 
long-term relationship in your company. 
EDUCATION 
UNIVERSITY OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY – VNU HCM 
            Sep 2015 – Now 
Major: Computer Engineering 
GPA: 7.01/10 
EXPERIENCE 
Nexts Company 
July-02 2019 to Aug-30 2019 
Programmer C/C++, Linux. 
Main responsibilities: Application “Logger” to record data from Lidar, Can Bus, Camera, … 
Project use C++ programming in Linux (Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04) with Qt5 Framework, 
Git, Shell Programming, ROS2, to trigger record or stop record data.
Sort system by color and size 
In semester 
Team leader 
Main responsibilities: Hardware design and Software programming. 
Project use Arduino code, OpenCV in python and Conveyor to classify tomatoes by maturity based 
on color. 
Battleship game 
In semester 
Team Leader 
Main responsibilities: Hardware design and Software programming. 
Project use C programming, Nodejs, webservice, VPS, HTML, CSS, and ESP8266, NUC131 to 
build IOT system. 
Locate position 
In semester
Team leader 
Main responsibilities: Hardware design and Software programming. 
Project use C programming, AT command with ESP8266 and MSP430 to control car move from 
initial position to last position based on the location determination from 3-point router. 
SKILL 
Programming languages: C/C++, assembly, Python 
IT: Embedded System, PCB Design, Software Development. 
Soft skills: Self-learning, teamwork, communication, presentation 
CERTIFICATIONS 
Certificate of participation in contest AMO by UIT 
2017 
INTERESTS 
✓ Travel and eating  
✓ Soccer and esports 
✓ 
Reading the book 
and listen to music 
9/4/2019
